record.title: CHILDREN'S HEALTH INSURANCE PROGRAM REAUTHORIZATION ACT OF 2007--MOTION TO PROCEED
record.narrative:
CHILDREN'S HEALTH INSURANCE PROGRAM REAUTHORIZATION ACT OF 2007--MOTION TO PROCEED -- (Senate - October 26, 2007)

[Page: S13492]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that it be in order to move to proceed to Calendar No. 450, H.R. 3963.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I move to proceed to H.R. 3963 and send a cloture motion to the desk.

record.chair: The cloture motion having been presented under rule XXII, the Chair directs the clerk to read the motion.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

We, the undersigned Senators, in accordance with the provisions of rule XXII of the Standing Rules of the Senate, do hereby move to bring to a close debate on the motion to proceed to Cal. No. 450, H.R. 3963, Childrens' Health Insurance Program Reauthorization Act of 2007.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the mandatory quorum as required under rule XXII be waived.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
